name: com.theone.foundation.buildscript
description: Unity build script that use to build for multiple platform.

_upm.changelog:
### [1.2.11] - 2025-10-28
- Fixed critical bug: Removed semicolon after if statement in CreateOrUpdateTheOneCDNProfile
- Added ConditionalBuildSchemaBase abstract base class for conditional schemas
- Added BuildConstants class for centralized constants and paths
- Added BuildTools helper methods: RemoveDefineSymbol, AddDefineSymbol, RemoveDefineSymbols, AreAllDefinesSet, IsAnyDefineSet
- Refactored IncludeInBuildWithSymbolSchema to extend base class (113→56 lines)
- Refactored ExcludeInBuildWithSymbolSchema to extend base class (118→62 lines)
- Eliminated ~150-180 lines of duplicated code across the codebase

### [1.2.10] - 2025-01-16
- Fixed addressable compression mode configuration
- Moved compression logic before setting initialization
- Ensures proper LZ4 (WebGL) and LZMA (Production) compression

### [1.2.4] - 2025-01-15
- Added inline changelog in package.json for Unity Package Manager
- Recent version history now visible directly in Package Manager UI

### [1.2.3] - 2025-01-15
- Added Unity Package Manager documentation links (changelog, documentation, license)
- Fixed changelog visibility in Package Manager UI
